title: Easeout Weekly #6
short: A weekly roundup of the latest web design & development news.
body:
![Google Sheets and Eleventy](/images/uploads/11ty-sheets.png) [Creating an Editable Site with Google Sheets and Eleventy](https://css-tricks.com/creating-an-editable-site-with-google-sheets-and-eleventy/) How to build a performant static site with eleventy that takes its data from Google Sheets and deploys automatically whenever updates are made. [Read it ](https://css-tricks.com/creating-an-editable-site-with-google-sheets-and-eleventy/)➡️
![Make Life Easier When Using Git](/images/uploads/git-codewall.png) [How To Make Life Easier When Using Git](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/make-life-easier-when-using-git/) You don’t need to know your trees from your dangling blobs. If you use Git every day and feel like it’s a juggling act, then here are some tricks and tips to help make your life a bit easier. [Read it](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/make-life-easier-when-using-git/) ➡️
![Category Page Design Wireframe](/images/uploads/ecommerce-category-page-design-for-mobile.png) [How To Increase Mobile Conversions With Category Page Design](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/mobile-conversions-category-page-design/) Recent research has found that e-commerce category pages have higher click-through rates in search than individual category pages. So, if your e-commerce site is struggling to attract shoppers and convert them, your category pages (specifically, those on mobile) might be in need of a redesign. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/mobile-conversions-category-page-design/)
![Developer Tools](/images/uploads/4-how-should-designers-learn-to-code-git-hmtl-css-engineering-principles.png) [How Should Designers Learn To Code? Git, HTML/CSS, Engineering Principles (Part 2)](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/designers-code-git-hmtl-css-engineering-principles/) Paul Hanaoka continues this series explaining the topics of version control (Git), HTML and CSS, semantic code, also with a brief introduction to some key engineering principles. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/03/designers-code-git-hmtl-css-engineering-principles/)
